entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
